price: Sọ pé: “Òdodo ti dé. Irọ́ (èṣù) kò lè mú n̄ǹkan bẹ, kò sì lè dá n̄ǹkan padà (lẹ́yìn tó ti kú).”
arabic: قُلۡ جَآءَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَمَا يُبۡدِئُ ٱلۡبَٰطِلُ وَمَا يُعِيدُ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qul jāa al-ḥaqu wamā yub'di-u al-bāṭilu wamā yuʿīdu
